exttest.name: Individual regular reference
exttest.code: Individual regular reference.<ref>This is a regular reference.</ref><references/>
exttest.expect:
Individual regular reference.[1]
  1. . This is a regular reference.

exttest.name: Multiple regular references
exttest.code: Multiple regular references.<ref>This is the first in reference.</ref><ref>This is the second reference.</ref><ref>This is the third reference.</ref><ref>This is the fourth reference.</ref><references/>
exttest.expect:
Multiple regular references.[1][2][3][4]
  1. . This is the first in reference.
  2. . This is the second reference.
  3. . This is the third reference.
  4. . This is the fourth reference.

exttest.name: Named references
exttest.code: Named references.<ref name="test">This is a reference named "test".</ref><ref name="test"/><ref name="test"/><ref name="test"/><references/>
exttest.expect:
Named references.[1][1][1][1]
  1. . 1.0 1.1 1.2 1.3 This is a reference named "test".

exttest.name: Grouped references
exttest.code: Grouped references.<ref group="testgroup">This is the first group reference.</ref><ref group="testgroup">This is the second group reference.</ref><ref group="testgroup">This is the third group reference.</ref><ref group="testgroup">This is the fourth group reference.</ref><references group="testgroup"/>
exttest.expect:
Grouped references.[testgroup 1][testgroup 2][testgroup 3][testgroup 4]
  1. . This is the first group reference.
  2. . This is the second group reference.
  3. . This is the third group reference.
  4. . This is the fourth group reference.

exttest.name: Named grouped references
exttest.code: Named grouped references.<ref name="test" group="testgroup">This is the first named group references.</ref><ref name="test" group="testgroup">This is the second named group references.</ref><ref name="test" group="testgroup">This is the third named group reference.</ref><ref name="test" group="testgroup">This is the fourth named group reference.</ref><references group="testgroup"/>
exttest.expect:
Named grouped references.[testgroup 1][testgroup 1][testgroup 1][testgroup 1]
  1. . 1.0 1.1 1.2 1.3 This is the first named group references.

exttest.name: newtest
exttest.code: Named grouped references.<ref name="test" group="testgroup">This is the first named group references.</ref><ref name="test" group="testgroup">This is the second named group references.</ref><ref name="test" group="testgroup">This is the third named group reference.</ref><ref name="test" group="testgroup">This is the fourth named group reference.</ref><references group="testgroup"/>
exttest.expect:
Named grouped references.[testgroup 1][testgroup 1][testgroup 1][testgroup 1]
  1. . 1.0 1.1 1.2 1.3 This is the first named group references.
